Title: Relates to the repurchase of untaxed or seized cigarettes
Summary: Relates to the repurchase of untaxed or seized cigarettes; requires the manufacturer of untaxed or seized cigarettes to repurchase such cigarettes and pay to the commissioner an amount equal to the cost of such cigarettes as sold to a wholesaler or agent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the repurchase of untaxed or seized cigarettes
